attributes.action: Stop police forces using unmanned spy drones
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A conglomerate of public services and private enterprises (including five police forces and BAE Systems) plan to use unmanned airships that fly at 20,000ft to monitor the movements of British citizens.



This is on the premise of counter terrorism and rural/maritime crime prevention and is scheduled to be implemented by 2012

Sign if you do not wish to be spied upon without your knowledge by your police force.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
